attributes.action: Ask the Queen to sack the Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: His comments about Sharia law has been unhelpful this country has always been a democratic and Christian country and there should not be law for one religion and another law for another religion. There is only one law in Britain and we should abide by it whatever our religion. If you want sharia law then go and live in a country where they practice sharia law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
